This APP is mainly used for fixed-line telephone (landline telephone) and mobile phone call recording, and needs to be used with our company's Bluetooth device. 

Features:
1. Recording mode can be set: Auto Recording / Manual Mode / Auto Answer.
* Auto Recording: When you make or receive a call, it starts to record automatically.
* Auto Answer: If the user does not answer the call, it will automatically answer with a piece of speech, and then the other party can leave a message.
* Manual mode: The user needs to manually start recording.
2. When recording, it can recognize speech into text at the same time. Support Mandarin, Cantonese, English.
3. When calling, it can wake up the APP, do not need to manually start the APP. Support background running. (Need to open the "Always Locate" permission).
4. When the device is powered off or not working, the APP automatically suspends with no power consumption.
5. Recording file management is convenient. You can manage, share, listen on the APP; you can also download it on the computer and listen to it.
6. When the phone is playing music or making a call, it can still record and recognize speech normally.
7. The recording file is saved on the phone, not uploaded to the server. Don't worry about the call leakage problem.
8. Can turn off the microphone, so only the sound inside the phone is recorded, and the ambient sound is not recorded. For example, only the music played on the phone is recorded.
9. Can turn on the noise suppression function to improve the recording clarity.

【Tips】
1. Please open Permissions: In "Settings - Privacy - Location Services" options, allow "Call Recorder" to "always" access location information.
The purpose is to automatically wake up the APP if the APP is not lanuched when using the recording device.
2. APP needs to use Bluetooth connection. Please turn on the phone Bluetooth to work properly.
3. When the recording device is connected, the APP will continue to use the GPS location service during use. When switch to the background, it will consume more power and affect the battery life.
